context.p: Cloudera ManagerInstalling the Data Collector parcelYou can use Cloudera Manager to install the on a cluster. When working with multiple clusters, perform the following steps for each cluster.

step.cmd: Copy the StreamSets parcel file to the Cloudera Manager Local Parcel Repository Path. By default, the path is /opt/cloudera/parcel-repo.
step.info: StreamSets provides different parcel files for different operating systems. Use the parcel file appropriate for the target operating system.

To verify the path to use, in Cloudera Manager, click Administration Settings . In the navigation panel, select the Parcels category. Place the parcel file in the path configured for Local Parcel Repository Path.

step.cmd: To view the list of available parcels, in the menu bar, click the Parcels icon: .
step.info: The StreamSets parcel displays in the list of available parcels. If it doesn't display, click Check for New Parcels.

step.cmd: To download the parcel to the local repository, click Download.
step.info: After the parcel is downloaded, the Download button becomes the Distribute button.

step.cmd: To distribute the parcel to the cluster, click Distribute.
step.info: After distribution, the Distribute button becomes the Activate button.

step.cmd: To activate the parcel, click Activate.
